title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Jhumka - "Pachala Rallu Vajrala Jhumka"
materials: Pear-shaped Emerald (Pachala Rallu) with VS Clarity
South Sea Pearl Dangles. Features signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Exquisite Jhumka design featuring a floral motif with a central Emerald. The Jhumka dome is intricately set with shimmering diamonds in a lace-like pattern, offering a modern take on the traditional 'Guttapusalu' design with South Sea Pearl dangles. Floral design on top of the Jumka also has diamonds and is in a 3 dimensional shape.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi and Diwali
and also suitable for grand evening events. Ideal for a bride or as a special gift for Seemantham or a half-saree function.
description: These earrings represent a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian jewelry craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic. The vibrant Emerald and dazzling diamonds create a striking contrast, symbolizing prosperity and beauty. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance, making this a valuable heirloom piece. The intricate details showcase the skill of our master artisans.
